News

The lastest news about Atmosphere

February 27, 2023

Minneapolis hip-hop duo has announced that they are set to release a new album. Sean Daley shared the inspiration behind his album as 'a silver lining' amisdt George Floyd's death in Minneapolis. Daley recalls that day and how the incident happened a few blocks from his studio. Although the death of George Floyd was a dark time in America, he insisted on working on music that brings positivity because if it helped him get through this dark time, then he hopes this album with help others as well. The album, 'So Many Other Realities Exist Simultaneously' will be released on all streaming platforms on May 5, 2023.
